subject: Re: [sugar] sanitycheck / libabiword-plugins patches
body:
Hey Marco,There is a module that is built with gtk:./lib/gtk-2.0/2.10.0/printbackends/libprintbackend-cups.soHave a good one,ManuelOn 5/29/07, 
Marco Pesenti Gritti <mpg@redhat.com> wrote:
Manuel Aguilar wrote:> Hey folks,>> As I was running my first build, I made a couple of patches  that will> add an extra check for cups headers (for systems that need to install> a devel package) and a path correction for the libabiword-plugins module:
>> --- sanitycheck.py      2007-05-28 23:08:44.000000000 -0400> +++ /home/manuel/videos/2007-05-28-SUGAR/sanitycheck.py 2007-05-28> 21:02:38.000000000 -0400> @@ -178,6 +178,7 @@>          
checker.check_header(' tiff.h', 'libtiff')>          checker.check_header('ncurses.h', 'ncurses')>          checker.check_header('expat.h', 'expat')> +       
checker.check_header('cups/cups.h', 'cups')>          checker.check_library('theora')>          checker.check_library('gnutls')>          checker.check_pixbuf_loader('svg')
What is using cups?Thanks,Marco
